rules_text:
Golden Company Valiant can block any number of creatures.
At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, Golden Company Valiant gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature that player controls.
flavor_text:
[i]“The few survivors retreated, and a lone new recruit stayed behind to hold back the enemy army.”
—Azamir, “Fall Of Golden Company”[/i]
artist: Joo d r a w s
